document.full_text: three u.s. citizens and their two companies were indicted on thursday for illegally exporting millions of dollars worth of computers to iran via the united arab emirates, the justice department said.
document.title: u.s. charges three over computer exports to iran
lines_and_colors: three u.s. citizens and their two companies were indicted on thursday for illegally exporting millions of dollars worth of computers to iran via the united arab emirates, the justice department said.
